articles.title: World Immunization Week: WHO highlights other diseases as coronavirus vaccine trials begin - Euronews
articles.description: As coronavirus vaccine trials begin in the UK and get the green light in Germany, the World Health Organization warns other diseases must not be neglected.
articles.content:
The beginning of UK clinical trials this week to find a coronavirus vaccine coincides with the start of World Immunization Week -- encouraging the use of vaccines to protect people against disease generally.
